reference.title: Content Packs
reference.shortdesc: Content packs help to define, create, and manage the content.

section.p:
The content pack is an encapsulation of:
Content Definitions
Property Definitions
Actions
Applications
Events
Execution Environments
Other Resources

The provider defines the domain model, shares the pack with a select or broader audience, and monetizes the proceeds of usage. The provider creates and deploys the domain model in the Object Store in the access-controlled environment.
The consumer uses the content packs provided by various providers and pays for the services.
